entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 8:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa steady
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 20 mm near the North Shore. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:50 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
